page.title: 10 A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: Every school day starts at 9'o'clock with{registration}.After this there are 5,hour long periods,with a 15 minute break in the morning,and lunch from12.30 to 1.30.School closes at 3.35p.m. There are 902 pupils,and 70 teachers in {Kilsyth Academy}.Each pupil takes several subjects,some of which he can choose himself.Everyone does {English, {Mathematics,R.E., and P.E.}Optional subjects include food and nutrition,craft and design,modern studies,french,history,geography,and german. Many of the pupils live miles away from the school ,and so must travel by bus.This is free. Adults have just been allowed to attend lessons beside pupils in the senior school.
